Module com.example.brickdestroy
Package com.arcadegame.brickdestroy

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.arcadegame.brickdestroy.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
A controller class to store all the functions of the game scene
